markdownRemark.html:
This episode was one of the best in both seasons. Ishigami for the win! I need a spin-off series for his character!

The shoujo part at the end was super funny. I just feel so bad for Shirogane, he works his butt off but always loses. The wrist grab at the end was a nice try, didnâ€™t work ðŸ˜‚

frontmatter.title: Uchi Tama - Uchi no Tama Shirimasen ka 1x1
